lim_jump.description: Maximum absolute value for jump detection

x_offset.description: Time offset applied to the timestamps of the input data on import

y_offset.description: Offset applied to the values of the input data on import

moving_average.description: Compute a moving average using a time window of this size to the input data

csv_file.description: Read data from this csv file. The csv file must have one column for the timestamps called 'timestart' and one column per series of data with the series_id in the header

observations.description: list of observations. Each element must be an ObservationDict or an ObservationArray

save_post.description: Local path where to save output data sent to API (when uploading analysis results)
